awards.text: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A volunteer soldier plummets to his death. A photograph is taken and sent by courier to a huge man, who adds it to his macabre collection.
plot: A volunteer soldier plummets to his death. A photograph is taken and sent by courier to a huge man, who adds it to his macabre collection.
title: Fallen Art
